name: Carrot
text: [On Play] If you have 3 or more DON!! cards on the field, look at the top 7 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 [Zou] and put it into your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order and play up to 1 [Zou] from your hand.

effect.text: If you have 3 or more DON!! cards on the field, look at the top 7 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 [Zou] and put it into your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order and play up to 1 [Zou] from your hand.
